verses.roman:
eta mane kari' prabhu mauna kari' rahilā
jāniyā gopāla kichu bhaṅgī uṭhāilā

synonyms: eta—so much; mane kari'-considering within the mind; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mauna—silent; kari'-becoming; rahilā—remained; jāniyā—knowing; gopāla—the Deity Gopāla; kichu—some; bhaṅgī—tricks; uṭhāilā—raised.
translation: Thinking in this way, the Lord remained silent, and Lord Gopāla, knowing His contemplation, played a trick.
